page.title: 19RECREATION-RAWYARDS CENTRE
page.content: {RAWYARDS SPORTS COMPLEX}IN SQUARE 7766 COMPRISES A SYNTHETIC FOOTBALL PITCH, FLOODLIT FOR EVENING USE IN WINTER, A FULL-SCALE BMX TRACK, TWO GRASS PITCHES FOR RUGBY AND FOOTBALL, A FLOODLIT BLAES FOOTBALL PITCH, AN ATHLETICS TRACK, A BLAES HOCKEY PRACTICE AREA AND AN INDOOR LEISURE CENTRE. AT{MONKLANDS LEISURE CENTRE, {AIRDRIE}EXERCISE IS OFFERRED IN MANY SHAPES AND FORMS. APART FROM BADMINTON, SQUASH, TENNIS, NETBALL, BASKETBALL, VOLLEYBALL, HANDBALL, INDOOR HOCKEY, FIVE-A-SIDE FOOTBALL. INDOOR GOLF, ARCHERY, GYMNASTICS AND SAUNA, ETC. THERE ARE COURSES AND CLASSES TO SUIT EVERY NEED AND AGE GROUP e.g.KEEP-FIT CLASSES FOR LADIES WITH EMPHASIS ON BENDING, STRETCHING AND RHYTHMIC MOVEMENTS TO MUSIC.
